channel.title: Show table/column comments in the DB schema browser
channel.description:
**Context**: For easing querying the schema, comments on tables and columns are defined in the database (PostgreSQL).
**Problem statement:** Other tools like DBeaver display table/column comments when the user hovers over the table or column with the mouse. This peace of functionality isn't available in Redash.
I haven't found a related issue in GitHub for this improvement.
Please let me know what do think of it.
Thanks, Laszlo
